sentences.en: Fund-raising is peripheral to their main activities.
sentences.cn: 对他们的主要活动而言，筹集资金是次要的。

sentences.en: Of course, fund-raising isn't the only skill outsiders offer.
sentences.cn: 当然，融资并不是外来者能提供的唯一技能。

sentences.en: The fund-raising ability is largely a product of experience and necessity.
sentences.cn: 筹集资金的能力在很大程度上是经验和必要性的产物。
